about_the_game:
New Island:

The Isola Tartaruga has emerged near Isola Tornanti and boasts its very own Stunt Arena perched at its peak. This island is a paradise for thrill-seekers, offering many opportunities to showcase your creativity and stunt skills!

New Career:

With the arrival of the Stunt King, new stunt challenges are coming to Screw Drivers! Build your car and showcase your skills with the flippiest saltos, longest jumps, craziest spins, and most perfect landings. Collect Stunt Coins along the way to score extra points and dominate the leaderboard! Hm? What are you waiting for?

New Building Blocks:

A new island means new building blocks! Unlock a variety of stylish stunt parts to create your ultimate dream stunt vehicle. These include cage blocks, flame-spitting exhausts, a smoke trail block, skateboard wheels, stunt wheels, a poser spoiler, and super fancy neon lights. Let your creativity run wild and build the most eye-catching, high-performing car for your stunts!

short_description: In the Stunt Showdown extension of Screw Drivers, you'll embark on an exciting new Stunt Campaign set on Isola Tartaruga, an island ruled by a stunt-obsessed monarch. Design your ultimate stunt car using a variety of new building parts and prove your skills to dethrone the Stunt King!
